GS41brhats_u:381: 5.54ab/ harite roga^*ulbaṇatā[K.ulvaṇatā] sasyānām ītibhiś ca vidhvaṃsaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:393: 5.60ab/ paśyan grastaṃ saumyo ghṛta^madhu^taila^kṣayāya rājṇāṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:395: 5.61ab/ śukraḥ sasya^vimardaṃ nānā^kleśāṃś ca janayati dharitryām/
GS41brhats_u:396: 5.61cd/ ravijaḥ karoty avṛṣṭiṃ durbhikṣaṃ taskara^bhayaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:397: 5.62ab/ yad aśubham avalokanābhir uktaṃ grahajanitaṃ grahaṇe pramokṣaṇe vā/
GS41brhats_u:398: 5.62cd/ surapatiguruṇā^avalokite tat^śamam upayāti jalair iva^agnir iddhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:399: 5.63ab/ graste kramān nimittaiḥ punar graho māsa^ṣaṭka^parivṛddhyā/
GS41brhats_u:402: 5.64cd/ dṛptāś ca manujapatayaḥ pīḍyante kṣitisute graste//
GS41brhats_u:410: 5.68cd/ gomanta^pāriyātra^āśritāś[K's tr. gomantaḥ pāriyātrā] ca nāśaṃ vrajanty āśu//
GS41brhats_u:412: 5.69b kalmāṣān atha śūrasena^sahitān kāśīś ca santāpayet/
GS41brhats_u:415: 5.70ab/ kāśmīrakān kauśalakān sapuṇḍrān mṛgāṃś ca hanyād aparāntakāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:416: 5.70cd/ ye somapās tāṃś ca nihanty saumye suvṛṣṭi^kṛt kṣema^subhikṣa^kṛt^ca//
GS41brhats_u:418: 5.71cd/ dhvaṃsaṃ vrajanty atra ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ bhayaṃ ca vindyād asubhikṣa^yutam//
GS41brhats_u:429: 5.75ab/ vaiśākha^*māse[K.māsi] grahaṇe vināśam āyānti karpāsa^tilāḥ sa^mudgāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:431: 5.76ab/ jyeṣṭhe[K.jyaiṣṭhe] narendra^dvija^rājapatnyaḥ sasyāni vṛṣṭiś ca mahāgaṇāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:432: 5.76cd/ pradhvaṃsam āyānti narāś ca saumyāḥ sālvaiḥ sametāś ca niṣāda^saṅghāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:436: 5.78b gāndhārān api madhyadeśa^sahitān vṛṣṭo grahaḥ śrāvaṇe/
GS41brhats_u:437: 5.78c kāmboja^ekaśaphāṃś ca śāradam api tyaktvā yathoktān imān
GS41brhats_u:447: 5.81ab/ hanu^kukṣi^pāyu^bhedā dvir dviḥ sañchardanaṃ ca jaraṇaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:448: 5.81cd/ madhya^antayoś ca vidaraṇam iti daśa śaśi^sūryayor mokṣāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:450: 5.82cd/ sasya^vimardo mukha^rug nṛpa^pīḍā syāt suvṛṣṭiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:452: 5.83cd/ mukharogaṃ śastra^bhayaṃ tasmin vindyāt subhikṣaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:455: 5.85ab/ vāmas tu kukṣi^bhedo yady uttaramārga^saṃsthito rāhuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:456: 5.85cd/ strīṇāṃ garbha^vipattiḥ sasyāni ca tatra madhyāni//
GS41brhats_u:458: 5.86cd/ guhya^rug alpā vṛṣṭir dvayos tu rājñī^kṣayo vāme//
GS41brhats_u:459: 5.87ab/ pūrveṇa pragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā prāg eva ca^apasarpeta /
GS41brhats_u:461: 5.88ab/ prāk pragrahaṇaṃ yasmin paścād apasarpaṇaṃ tu taj jaraṇam/
GS41brhats_u:462: 5.88cd/ kṣut^śastra^bhaya^*udvignā na[K.udvignāḥ kva] śaraṇam upayānti tatra janāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:463: 5.89ab/ madhye yadi prakāśaḥ prathamaṃ tan madhya^vidaraṇaṃ nāma/
GS41brhats_u:467: 5.91ab/ ete sarve mokṣā vaktavyā bhāskare +api kintv atra/
GS41brhats_u:468: 5.91cd/ pūrvā dik śaśini yathā tathā ravau paścimā kalpyā//
GS41brhats_u:471: 5.93ab/ ulkā mantri^vināśaṃ nānāvarṇā ghanāś ca bhayam atulam/
GS41brhats_u:473: 5.94ab/ pariveṣo ruk^pīḍāṃ digdāho nṛpa^bhayaṃ ca sa^agni^bhayaṃ/
GS41brhats_u:474: 5.94cd/ rūkṣo vāyuḥ prabalaś caurasamutthaṃ bhayaṃ dhatte//
GS41brhats_u:475: 5.95ab/ nirghātaḥ suracāpaṃ daṇḍaś ca kṣud^bhayaṃ sa^paracakram/
GS41brhats_u:476: 5.95cd/ *grahayuddhe[K.grahayuddhaṃ] nṛpa^yuddhaṃ ketuś ca tad eva sandṛṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:478: 5.96cd/ yac ca^aśubhaṃ grahaṇajaṃ tat sarvaṃ nāśan upayāti//
GS41brhats_u:479: 5.97ab/ somagrahe nivṛtte pakṣānte yadi bhaved graho +arkasya/
GS41brhats_u:481: 5.98ab/ arkagrahāt tu śaśino grahaṇaṃ yadi dṛśyate tato viprāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:485: 6.01cd/ tad*vaktrām[K.vakram ū.vaktram] uṣṇam udaye pīḍā^karam agnivārttānām//
GS41brhats_u:487: 6.02cd/ dūṣayati rasān udaye karoti rogān avṛṣṭiṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:490: 6.04ab/ rudhira^ānanam iti vaktraṃ pañcadaśāt ṣoḍaśāc ca vinivṛtte/
GS41brhats_u:491: 6.04cd/ tat^kālaṃ mukha^rogaṃ sa^bhayaṃ ca subhikṣam āvahati//
GS41brhats_u:492: 6.05ab/ asi^muśalaṃ saptadaśād aṣṭādaśato +api vā tad anuvakre/
GS41brhats_u:498: 6.08ab/ madhyena yadi maghānāṃ gata^agataṃ lohitaḥ karoti tataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:499: 6.08cd/ pāṇḍyo nṛpo vinaśyati śastra^udyogād bhayam avṛṣṭiṃ//
GS41brhats_u:500: 6.09ab/ bhittvā *maghā[K.maghāṃ] viśākhāṃ bhindan bhaumaḥ karoti durbhikṣam/
GS41brhats_u:501: 6.09cd/ marakaṃ karoti ghoraṃ yadi bhittvā rohiṇīṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:504: 6.11ab/ prājāpatye śravaṇe mūle *triṣu ca^uttareṣu[K.tisṛṣūttarāsu] śākre ca/
GS41brhats_u:513: 7.01ab/ na^utpāta^parityaktaḥ kadā cid api candrajo vrajaty udayam/
GS41brhats_u:521: 7.05ab/ āryamṇaṃ hautabhujaṃ bhadrapadām uttrarāṃ yameśaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:533: 7.11ab/ yogāntikā^iti mūlaṃ dve ca^āṣāḍhe gatiḥ sutasya^indoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:551: 7.17cd/ vṛṣṭo bhayāya jagataḥ śubha^phala^kṛt proṣitas teṣu//
GS41brhats_u:552: 7.18ab/ *kārtike[K.kārttike] +aśvayuji vā yadi māse dṛśyate tanu^bhavaḥ śiśirāṃśoḥ/
GS41brhats_u:554: 7.19ab/ ruddhāni saumye *+astagate[K.astamite] purāṇi yāny udgate tāny upayānti mokṣam/
GS41brhats_u:555: 7.19cd/ anye tu paścād udite vadanti lābhaḥ purāṇāṃ bhavati tajjñāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:556: 7.20ab/ hema^kāntir atha vā śuka^varṇaḥ sasyakena maṇinā sadṛśo vā/
GS41brhats_u:557: 7.20cd/ snigdha^mūrtir alaghuś ca hitāya vyatyaye na śubha^kṛt śaśiputraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:562: 8.02cd/ kramaśas tribhaṃ tu pañcamam upāntyam antyaṃ ca yad varṣam//
GS41brhats_u:566: 8.04cd/ vyādhi^bhayaṃ mitrair api bhūpānāṃ jāyate vairam//
GS41brhats_u:571: 8.07ab/ phālguna^varṣe vindyāt kva cit kva cit kṣema^vṛṣṭi^sasyāni/
GS41brhats_u:572: 8.07cd/ daurbhāgyaṃ pramadānāṃ prabalāś caurā nṛpāś ca^ugrāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:573: 8.08ab/ caitre mandā vṛṣṭiḥ priyam annaṃ kṣemam avanipā mṛdavaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:574: 8.08cd/ vṛddhiś ca kośa^dhānyasya bhavati pīḍā ca rūpavatām//
GS41brhats_u:578: 8.10cd/ pīḍyante dhānyāni ca hitvā kaṅguṃ śamījātim//
GS41brhats_u:579: 8.11ab/ āṣāḍhe jāyante sasyāni kva cid avṛṣṭir anyatra/
GS41brhats_u:580: 8.11cd/ yogakṣemaṃ madhyaṃ vyagrāś ca bhavanti bhūpālāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:581: 8.12ab/ śrāvaṇa^varṣe kṣemaṃ samyak sasyāni pākam upayānti/
GS41brhats_u:582: 8.12cd/ kṣudrā ye *pākhaṇḍāḥ[K.pāṣaṇḍāḥ] pīḍyante ye ca tad^bhaktāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:583: 8.13ab/ bhādrapade vallījaṃ niṣpattiṃ yāti pūrvasasyaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:584: 8.13cd/ na bhavaty aparaṃ sasyaṃ kva cit subhikṣaṃ kvacic ca bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:585: 8.14ab/ āśvayuje +abde +ajasraṃ patati jalaṃ pramuditāḥ prajāḥ kṣemam/
GS41brhats_u:589: 8.16ab/ vicaran bha^dvayam iṣṭas tat^sārdhaṃ vatsareṇa madhya^phalaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:590: 8.16cd/ sasyānāṃ vidhvaṃsī vicared adhikaṃ yadi kadā cit//
GS41brhats_u:591: 8.17ab/ anala^bhayam anala^varṇe vyādhiḥ pīte raṇa^āgamaḥ śyāme/
GS41brhats_u:592: 8.17cd/ harite ca taskarebhyaḥ pīḍā rakte tu śastra^bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:594: 8.18cd/ vipule +amale sutāre rātrau dṛṣṭe prajāḥ svasthāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:595: 8.19a rohiṇyo +analabhaṃ ca vatsara^tanur nābhis tv aṣāḍha^dvayaṃ
GS41brhats_u:596: 8.19b sārpaṃ hṛt^pitṛ^daivataṃ ca kusumaṃ śuddhaiḥ śubhaṃ taiḥ phalam/
GS41brhats_u:598: 8.19d puṣpe mūla^phala^kṣayo +atha hṛdaye sasyasya nāśo dhruvam//
GS41brhats_u:608: 8.22ab/ ekaikam abdeṣu nava^āhateṣu dattvā pṛthag dvādaśakaṃ krameṇa/
GS41brhats_u:609: 8.22cd/ hṛtvā caturbhir vasudevatā^ādyāny uḍūni śeṣāṃśaka^pūrvam abdam//
GS41brhats_u:610: 8.23ab/ viṣṇuḥ surejyo balabhid dhutāśas tvaṣṭa^uttaraproṣṭhapadā^adhipaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:613: 8.24cd/ prajāpatiś ca^apy anuvatsaraḥ syād idvatsaraḥ śailasutāpatiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:614: 8.25ab/ vṛṣṭiḥ samādye pramukhe dvitīye prabhūta^toyā kathitā tṛtīye/
GS41brhats_u:615: 8.25cd/ paścāj jalaṃ muñcati yac caturthaṃ svalpa^udakaṃ pañcamam abdam uktam//
GS41brhats_u:617: 8.26cd/ catvāri madhyāni ca madhyamāni catvāri ca^antyāny adhamāni
GS41brhats_u:619: 8.27ab/ ādyaṃ dhaniṣṭāṃśam abhiprapanno māghe yadā yāty udayaṃ surejyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:620: 8.27cd/ ṣaṣṭy^abda^pūrvaḥ prabhavaḥ sa nāmnā *prapadyate[K.pravartate] bhūta^hitas tadābdaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:621: 8.28ab/ kva cit tv avṛṣṭiḥ pavana^agni^kopaḥ santi^ītayaḥ śleṣma^kṛtāś ca rogāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:622: 8.28cd/ saṃvatsare +asmin prabhave pravṛtte na duḥkham āpnoti janas tathā^api//
GS41brhats_u:623: 8.29ab/ tasmād dvitīyo vibhavaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ śuklas tṛtīyaḥ parataḥ pramodaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:624: 8.29cd/ prajāpatiś ca^iti yathottarāṇi śastāni varṣāṇi phalāny *atha^eṣām[K.caiṣām]//
GS41brhats_u:626: 8.30cd/ saṃhṛṣṭa^lokāṃ kali^doṣa^muktāṃ kṣatraṃ tadā śāsti ca bhūtadhātrīm//
GS41brhats_u:627: 8.31ab/ ādyo +aṅgirāḥ śrīmukha^bhāvasā^āhvau *yuvā sudhāteti[K.yuvātha dhāteti] yuge dvitīye/
GS41brhats_u:628: 8.31cd/ varṣāṇi pañca^eva yathākrameṇa trīṇy atra śastāni same pare dve//
GS41brhats_u:630: K's tr. ādyavarṣeṣu] nikāma^varṣī devī nirātaṅka^*bhayaś[K.bhayāś] ca lokaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:631: 8.32cd/ abda^dvaye +antye +api samā suvṛṣṭiḥ kintv atra rogāḥ samara^āgamaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:632: 8.33ab/ śākre yuge pūrvam atha^īśvara^ākhyaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ bahudhānyam āhuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:633: 8.33cd/ pramāthinaṃ vikramam apy *atha^anyad[K.ato +anyad] vṛṣaṃ ca vindyād gurucāra^yogāt//
GS41brhats_u:634: 8.34ab/ ādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca śubhe tu varṣe kṛta^anukāraṃ kurutaḥ prajānām/
GS41brhats_u:635: 8.34cd/ pāpaḥ pramāthī vṛṣa^vikramau tu subhikṣadau roga^bhaya^pradau ca//
GS41brhats_u:636: 8.35ab/ śreṣṭhaṃ ca caturthasya yugasya pūrvaṃ yac citrabhānuṃ kathayanti varṣam/
GS41brhats_u:637: 8.35cd/ madhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu subhānu^sañjñaṃ roga^pradaṃ mṛtyu^karaṃ *na taṃ ca[K.na tac ca]//
GS41brhats_u:639: 8.36cd/ pañcamaṃ vyayam uśanti śobhanaṃ manmatha^prabalam utsava^ākulam//
GS41brhats_u:640: 8.37ab/ tvāṣṭre yuge sarvajid^ādya uktaḥ saṃvatsaro +anyaḥ khalu sarvadhārī/
GS41brhats_u:641: 8.37cd/ tasmād virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaś ca śasto dvitīyo +atra bhayāya śeṣāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:642: 8.38ab/ nandano +atha vijayo jayas tathā manmatho +asya parataś ca durmukhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:643: 8.38cd/ kāntam atra yuga āditas trayaṃ manmathaḥ sama^phalo +adhamo +aparaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:644: 8.39ab/ hemalamba iti saptame yuge syād vilambi parato vikāri ca/
GS41brhats_u:645: 8.39cd/ śarvarīti tad^anu plavaḥ smṛto vatsaro guru^vaśena pañcamaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:647: 8.40b mandaṃ sasyaṃ na bahu^salilaṃ vatsare +ato dvitīye/
GS41brhats_u:649: 8.40d durbhikṣāya plava iti tataḥ śobhano bhūri^toyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:650: 8.41ab/ vaiśve yuge *śokahṛd[K.śobhakṛd] ity atha^ādyaḥ saṃvatsaro +ataḥ śubhakṛd dvitīyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:651: 8.41cd/ krodhī tṛtīyaḥ parataḥ krameṇa viśvāvasuś ca^iti parābhavaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:652: 8.42ab/ pūrvā^parau prīti^karau prajānām eṣāṃ tṛtīyo bahu^doṣado +abdaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:653: 8.42cd/ antyau samau kintu parābhave +agniḥ śastra^āmaya^ārtir dvija^go^bhayaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:654: 8.43ab/ ādyaḥ plavaṅgo navame yuge +abdaḥ syāt kīlako +anyaḥ parataś ca saumyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:656: 8.44ab/ kaṣṭaḥ plavaṅgo bahuśaḥ prajānāṃ sādhāraṇe +alpaṃ jalam ītayaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:657: 8.44cd/ yaḥ pañcamo rodhakṛd ity atha^abdaś citram jalam tatra ca sasyasampat//
GS41brhats_u:659: 8.45cd/ *pramādinaṃ vikramam apy ato +anyat[K.pramādyathānandamataḥ paraṃ yat] syād rākṣasaṃ ca^anala^saṃjñitam ca//
GS41brhats_u:660: 8.46ab/ paridhāvini madhyadeśa^nāśo nṛpa^hānir jalam alpam agni^kopaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:661: 8.46cd/ alasas tu janaḥ pramādi^saṃjñe ḍamaraṃ raktaka^puṣpa^bīja^nāśaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:665: 8.48cd/ ādye tu vṣṛṭir mahatī sacaurā śvāso hanū^kampa^yutaś ca kāsaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:666: 8.49ab/ yat kālayuktaṃ tad aneka^doṣaṃ siddhārtha^saṃjñe bahavo guṇāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:667: 8.49cd/ raudro +atiraudraḥ kṣaya^kṛt pradiṣṭo yo durmatir madhyama^vṛṣṭi^kṛt saḥ//
GS41brhats_u:668: 8.50ab/ bhāgye yuge dundubhi^saṃjñam ādyaṃ sasyasya vṛddhiṃ mahatīṃ karoti/
GS41brhats_u:669: 8.50cd/ *aṅgāra^saṃjñaṃ[K.udgārisaṃjñaṃ] tad^anu kṣayāya nareśvarāṇāṃ viṣamā ca vṛṣṭiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:670: 8.51ab/ raktākṣam abdaṃ kathitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tasmin bhayaṃ daṃṣṭri^kṛtaṃ gadāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:671: 8.51cd/ krodhaṃ bahu^krodha^karaṃ caturthaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi śūnyīkurute virodhaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:675: 8.52d kathitam akhilaṃ ṣaṣṭy^abde yat tad atra samāsataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:680: 9.01cd/ aśviny^ādyāḥ kaiś cit tribhāḥ kramād vīthayaḥ kathitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:681: 9.02ab/ nāgā tu pavana^yāmya^analāni paitāmahāt tribhās tisraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:682: 9.02cd/ govīthyām aśvinyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ dve ca^api bhadrapade//
GS41brhats_u:683: 9.03ab/ jāradgavyāṃ śravaṇāt tribhaṃ mṛga^ākhyā tribhaṃ tu maitra^ādyam/
GS41brhats_u:689: 9.06ab/ uttaramārgo yāmya^ādi nigadito madhyamas tu bhāgya^ādyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:690: 9.06cd/ dakṣiṇa^mārgo^āṣāḍhā^ādi kaiś cid evaṃ kṛtā mārgāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:692: 9.07cd/ svayam evā vikalpayituṃ kintu bahūnāṃ mataṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:699: 9.11ab/ atra^uditam ārohed graho +aparo yadi sitaṃ tato hanyāt/
GS41brhats_u:709: 9.16ab/ svāty^ādyaṃ bha^tritayaṃ maṇḍalam etac caturtham abhaya^karam/
GS41brhats_u:717: 9.20ab/ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaṇnakṣatraṃ śubham etan maṇḍalaṃ dhaniṣṭhā^ādyam/
GS41brhats_u:721: 9.22ab/ aparasyāṃ svāty^ādyaṃ jyeṣṭhā^ādyaṃ ca^api maṇḍalaṃ śubhadam/
GS41brhats_u:727: 9.25ab/ prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvā^iva pātakaṃ vasudhā/
GS41brhats_u:737: 9.30ab/ kaurava^citrakarāṇāṃ haste pīḍā jalasya ca nirodhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:740: 9.31cd/ aindra^agne +api suvṛṣṭir vaṇijāṃ ca bhayaṃ vijānīyāt//

GS41brhats_u:852: 11.17cd/ vipulasitatārakās te snigdhāś ca bhavanti tīvraphalāḥ//

GS41brhats_u:861: 11.22ab/ triṃśaty adhikā rāhos te tāmasakīlakā iti khyātāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:874: 11.28cd/ evaṃ ketu^sahasraṃ viśeṣam eṣām ato vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:876: 11.29cd/ sadyaḥ karoti marakaṃ subhikṣam apy uttamaṃ kurute//

GS41brhats_u:885: 11.33cd/ gacched yathā yathodak tathā tathā dairghyam āyāti//

GS41brhats_u:890: 11.36ab/ anyān api sa deśān kva cit kva cid dhanti rogadurbhikṣaiḥ/

GS41brhats_u:894: 11.38ab/ snigdhau subhikṣaśivadāv athādhikaṃ dṛśyate kanāmā yaḥ/

GS41brhats_u:903: 11.42cd/ gṛhiṇām upaskareṣu ca vināśināṃ darśanaṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:904: 11.43ab/ kumuda iti kumudakāntir vāruṇyāṃ prākśikho niśām ekām/
GS41brhats_u:905: 11.43cd/ dṛṣṭaḥ subhikṣam atulaṃ daśa kila varṣāṇi sa karoti//

GS41brhats_u:910: 11.46ab/ jalaketur api ca paścāt snigdhaḥ śikhayāpareṇa ca^unnatayā/
GS41brhats_u:911: 11.46cd/ nava māsān sa subhikṣaṃ karoti śāntiṃ ca lokasya//
GS41brhats_u:912: 11.47ab/ bhavaketur ekarātraṃ dṛśyaḥ prāk sūkṣmatārakaḥ snigdhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:914: 11.48ab/ yāvata eva muhūrtān darśanam āyāti nirdiśet^māsān/

GS41brhats_u:916: 11.49ab/ apareṇa padmaketur mṛṇālagauro bhaven niśām ekām/
GS41brhats_u:919: 11.50cd/ yāvat kṣaṇān sa dṛśyas tāvan māsān subhikṣakaraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:922: 11.52ab/ yāvata eva muhūrtān dṛśyo varṣāṇi hanti tāvanti/
GS41brhats_u:924: 11.53ab/ ye śastās tān hitvā ketubhir *ādhūpite[K.ādhūmite] +atha vā spṛṣṭe/

GS41brhats_u:999: 12.20cd/ dṛśyate yadi *tadā[K.tataḥ] pracurānnā bhūr bhavaty abhaya^roga^jana^āḍhyā//

GS41brhats_u:1122: 15.15cd/ ye sādhavaś ca loke sarvaṃ ca śaratsamutpannam//

GS41brhats_u:1189: 16.15ab/ lohityaḥ sindhunadaḥ sarayūr gāmbhīrikā rathākhyā ca/

GS41brhats_u:1220: 16.30cd/ naṣṭā yasmin deśe sarasvatī paścimo deśaḥ/

GS41brhats_u:1299: 17.27cd/ phalaṃ tu vācyaṃ graha^bhaktito +anyad yathā tathā ghnanti hatāḥ svabhaktīḥ//

GS41brhats_u:1303: 18.02ab/ candramā yadi kujasya yāty udak pārvatīya^balaśālināṃ jayaḥ/

GS41brhats_u:2516: 44.01ab/ khañjanako nāma^ayaṃ yo vihagas tasya darśane prathame/

GS41brhats_u:2836: 47.02ab/ yā vyākhyātā śāntiḥ svayambhuvā suraguror mahendra^arthe/

GS41brhats_u:2847: 47.07cd/ virute vanopakaṇṭhe kṣetra^āgāre śucāv atha vā//
GS41brhats_u:2858: 47.13ab/ kṣamayā krodha iva jitaḥ siṃho mṛgya^abhibhūyate *yeṣu[K.yatra]/
GS41brhats_u:2866: 47.17ab/ dhātrī ghanā sugandhā snigdhā madhurā samā ca vijayāya/
GS41brhats_u:2869: 47.18cd/ kauberyāṃ vā kṛtvā baliṃ diśīśādhipāyāṃ vā//
GS41brhats_u:2871: 47.19cd/ āvāhanam atha mantras tasmin munibhiḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2873: 47.20cd/ diśo nāgā dvijāś ca^eva ye *ca^apy anye[K.cāney apy] +aṃśabhāginaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2874: 47.21ab/ āvāhya^evam tataḥ sarvān evaṃ brūyāt purohitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2875: 47.21cd/ śvaḥ pūjāṃ prāpya yāsyanti dattvā śāntiṃ mahīpateḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2876: 47.22ab/ āvāhiteṣu kṛtvā pūjāṃ tāṃ śarvarīṃ vaseyus te/
GS41brhats_u:2880: 47.24ab/ tasmin maṇḍalam ālikhya kalpayet tatra medinīm/
GS41brhats_u:2882: 47.25ab/ purohito yathāsthānaṃ nāgān yakṣān surān pitṝn/
GS41brhats_u:2883: 47.25cd/ gandharva^apsarasaś ca^eva munīn siddhāṃś ca vinyaset//
GS41brhats_u:2884: 47.26ab/ grahāṃś ca *sarva[K.saha]nakṣatrai rudrāṃś ca saha mātṛbhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2885: 47.26cd/ skandaṃ viṣṇuṃ viśākhaṃ ca lokapālān surastriyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2888: 47.28ab/ bhakṣyair annaiś ca vividhaiḥ phala^mūla^āmiṣais tathā/
GS41brhats_u:2890: 47.29ab/ kathayāmy ataḥ param ahaṃ pūjām asmin yathābhilikhitānām/
GS41brhats_u:2891: 47.29cd/ grahayajñe yaḥ prokto vidhir grahāṇāṃ sa kartavyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2894: 47.31ab/ sāma^yajurbhir munayas tv ṛgbhir gandhaiś ca dhūpa^mālya^yutaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2897: 47.32cd/ gandharvān apsaraso gandhair mālyaiś ca susugandhaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2898: 47.33ab/ śeṣāṃs tu sārvavarṇika^balibhiḥ pūjāṃ nyasec ca sarveṣām/
GS41brhats_u:2901: 47.34cd/ ādadyāt sambhārān darbhān dīrghān agarbhāṃś ca//
GS41brhats_u:2904: 47.36ab/ saghṛtasya pāyasasya ca tatra śarāvāṇi taiś ca sambhāraiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2911: 47.39cd/ jīvāṃ viśveśvarīṃ pāṭhāṃ samaṅgāṃ vijayāṃ tathā//
GS41brhats_u:2912: 47.40ab/ sahāṃ ca sahadevīṃ ca pūrṇakośāṃ śatāvarīm/
GS41brhats_u:2913: 47.40cd/ ariṣṭikāṃ śivāṃ bhadrāṃ teṣu kumbheṣu vinyaset//
GS41brhats_u:2920: 47.44ab/ tato vṛṣasya yodhasya carma rohitam akṣatam/
GS41brhats_u:2921: 47.44cd/ simhasyātha tṛtīyaṃ syād vyāghrasya ca tataḥ param//
GS41brhats_u:2922: 47.45ab/ catvāry etāni carmāṇi tasyāṃ vedyām upāstaret/
GS41brhats_u:2935: 47.51cd/ adhike +adhike guṇottaram ayaṃ ca mantro +atra munigītaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2936: 47.52ab/ ājyaṃ tejaḥ samuddiṣṭam ājyaṃ pāpaharaṃ param/
GS41brhats_u:2937: 47.52cd/ ājyaṃ surāṇām āhāra ājye lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2938: 47.53ab/ bhauma^āntarikṣaṃ divyaṃ vā yat te *kalmaṣam[K.kalviṣaṃ] āgatam/

GS41brhats_u:2943: 47.55cd/ brahmā viṣṇuś ca *rudraś[K.śambhuś] ca sādhyāś ca samarudgaṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2944: 47.56ab/ ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca bhiṣagvarau/
GS41brhats_u:2945: 47.56cd/ aditir devamātā ca svāhā siddhiḥ sarasvatī//
GS41brhats_u:2946: 47.57ab/ kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ śrīś ca sinīvālī kuhūs tathā/
GS41brhats_u:2947: 47.57cd/ danuś ca surasā ca^eva vinatā kadrur eva ca//
GS41brhats_u:2948: 47.58ab/ devapatnyaś ca yā noktā devamātara eva ca/
GS41brhats_u:2949: 47.58cd/ sarvās tvām abhiṣiñcantu divyāś ca^apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2951: 47.59cd/ saṃvatsarā dineśāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kṣaṇā lavā/
GS41brhats_u:2956: 47.62ab/ saritaś ca mahābhāgā nāgāḥ kiṃpuruṣāś tathā/
GS41brhats_u:2957: 47.62cd/ vaikhānasā mahābhāgā dvijā vaihāyasāś ca ye//
GS41brhats_u:2958: 47.63ab/ saptarṣayaḥ sadārāś ca dhruvasthānāni yāni ca/
GS41brhats_u:2959: 47.63cd/ marīcir atriḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kratur aṅgirāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2961: 47.64cd/ sanātanaś ca dakṣaś ca jaigīṣavyo bhagandaraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2962: 47.65ab/ ekataś ca dvitaś ca^eva trito jābālikaśyapau/
GS41brhats_u:2963: 47.65cd/ durvāsā durvinītaś ca kaṇvaḥ kātyāyanas tathā//
GS41brhats_u:2967: 47.67cd/ parvatās taravo vallyaḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni ca//
GS41brhats_u:2968: 47.68ab/ prajāpatir ditiś ca^eva gāvo viśvasya mātaraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2970: 47.69ab/ agnayaḥ pitaras tārā jīmūtāḥ khaṃ diśo jalam/
GS41brhats_u:2973: 47.70cd/ *yathābhiṣikto maghavān etair mudita^manasaiḥ[K.kalyāṇam te prakurvantu āyurārogyam eva ca]//
GS41brhats_u:2974: 47.71ab/ ity etaiś cānyaiś ca^apy atharvakalpa^*āhitaiḥ[K.vihitaiḥ] sarudragaṇaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2982: 47.75ab/ gatvā dvitīyavedīṃ samupaviśec carmaṇāṃ upari rājā/
GS41brhats_u:2983: 47.75cd/ deyāni ca^eva carmāṇy uparyupary evam etāni//
GS41brhats_u:2984: 47.76ab/ vṛṣasya vṛṣadaṃśasya ruroś ca pṛṣatasya ca/
GS41brhats_u:2985: 47.76cd/ teṣām upari siṃhasya vyāghrasya ca tataḥ param//
GS41brhats_u:2990: 47.79ab/ yāntu devagaṇāḥ sarve pūjām ādāya pārthivāt/
GS41brhats_u:2992: 47.80ab/ nṛpatir ato daivajñaṃ purohitaṃ ca^arcayed dhanair bahubhiḥ/

GS41brhats_u:3009: 48.01ab/ vistaraśo nirdiṣṭaṃ paṭṭāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yad ācāryaiḥ/

GS41brhats_u:3032: 49.04ab/ sphuṭito hrasvaḥ kuṇṭho vaṃśacchinno na dṛg^mano +anugataḥ/

GS41brhats_u:3037: 49.06b paśyen na tatra vadanaṃ na vadec ca mūlyam/
GS41brhats_u:3038: 49.06c deśaṃ na cāsya kathayet pratimānayen na
GS41brhats_u:3042: 49.08ab/ niṣpanno na chedyo nikaṣaiḥ kāryaḥ pramāṇayuktaḥ saḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3043: 49.08cd/ mūle mriyate svāmī jananī tasyāgrataś chinne//

GS41brhats_u:3045: 49.09cd/ vanitānām iva tilako guhye vācyo mukhe dṛṣṭvā//
GS41brhats_u:3046: 49.10ab/ atha vā spṛśati yadaṅgaṃ praṣṭā nistriṃśabhṛt tadavadhārya/
GS41brhats_u:3049: 49.11cd/ bhrūmadhye ca tṛtīye netre spṛṣṭe catruthe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3054: 49.14ab/ ūrvor dvāviṃśe syād ūrvor madhye vraṇas trayoviṃśe/
GS41brhats_u:3055: 49.14cd/ jānuni ca caturviṃśe jaṅghāyāṃ pañcaviṃśe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3056: 49.15ab/ jaṅghāmadhye gulphe pārṣṇyāṃ pāde tadaṅgulīṣv api ca/
GS41brhats_u:3057: 49.15cd/ ṣaḍviṃśatikād yāvat triṃśad iti matena gargasya//
GS41brhats_u:3058: 49.16ab/ putramaraṇaṃ dhanāptir dhanahāniḥ sampadaś ca bandhaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3065: 49.19cd/ aiśvarya^mṛtyu^rājyāni ca kramāt triṃśad iti yāvat//
GS41brhats_u:3066: 49.20ab/ parato na viśeṣaphalaṃ viṣamasamasthās tu pāpaśubhaphaladāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3067: 49.20cd/ kaiś cid aphalāḥ pradiṣṭās triṃśatparato +agram iti yāvat//

GS41brhats_u:3158: 50.26cd/ bāhū bhrātā^atha tatpatnī spṛṣṭvā^evaṃ cauram ādiśet//
GS41brhats_u:3159: 50.27ab/ antar^aṅgam avamucya bāhya^ga^sparśanaṃ yadi karoti pṛcchakaḥ/

GS41brhats_u:3168: 50.29d atibahu tadā bhuktvā^annaṃ saṃsthitaḥ suhito vadet//
GS41brhats_u:3176: 50.33b śrutvā kravyādaṃ vā prekṣya vā māṃsamiśram/
GS41brhats_u:3181: 50.35ab/ dṛṣṭe śrute +apy aśakune godhā^matsya^āmiṣaṃ vaded bhuktam/
GS41brhats_u:3182: 50.35cd/ garbhiṇyā garbhasya ca nipatanam evaṃ prakalpayet praśne//

GS41brhats_u:3194: 50.39cd/ vāme *+abdau[K.dvau] karṇa evaṃ mā dvicaturghnaḥ śrutistane//

GS41brhats_u:3245: 52.02ab/ kim api kila bhūtam abhavad rundhānaṃ rodasī śarīreṇa/

GS41brhats_u:3282: 52.20cd/ yady agrato bhavati sā soṣṇīṣaṃ nāma tadvāstu//
GS41brhats_u:3283: 52.21ab/ sāyāśrayam iti paścāt sāvaṣṭambhaṃ tu pārśvasaṃsthitayā/

GS41brhats_u:3287: 52.23ab/ vyāsāt ṣoḍaśabhāgaḥ sarveṣāṃ sadmanāṃ bhavati bhittiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3295: 52.26cd/ śākhādvaye +api kāryaṃ sārdhaṃ tat syād udumbarayoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3299: 52.28cd/ dvātriṃśatā tu madhye pralīnako vṛtta iti vṛttaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3300: 52.29ab/ stambhaṃ vibhajya navadhā vahanaṃ bhāgo ghaṭo +asya bhāgo +anyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3302: 52.30ab/ stambhasamaṃ bāhulyaṃ bhāratulānām upary upary āsām/

GS41brhats_u:3333: 52.45ab/ śoṣo +atha pāpayakṣmā rogaḥ koṇe tato +ahi^mukhyau ca/

GS41brhats_u:3344: 52.50cd/ śeṣāś catvāro +anye tripadā dikṣv aryamādyās te//
GS41brhats_u:3346: 52.51cd/ āpo mukhe stane +asyāryamā hy urasy āpavatsaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3348: 52.52cd/ satyādyāḥ pañca bhuje haste savitā *ca sāvitraḥ[K.sasāvitraḥ]//
GS41brhats_u:3349: 52.53ab/ vitatho bṛhatkṣatayutaḥ pārśve jaṭhare sthito vivasvāṃś ca/

GS41brhats_u:3351: 52.54ab/ ete dakṣiṇapārśve sthāneṣv evaṃ ca vāmapārśvasthāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3353: 52.55ab/ aṣṭa^aṣṭakapadam atha vā kṛtvā rekhāś ca koṇagās tiryak/
GS41brhats_u:3355: 52.56ab/ aṣṭau ca bahiṣkoṇeṣv ardhapadās tad^ubhaya^sthitāḥ sa^ardhāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3356: 52.56cd/ uktebhyo ye śeṣās te dvipadā viṃśatis te *hi[K.ca]//
GS41brhats_u:3357: 52.57ab/ sampātā vaṃśānāṃ madhyāni samāni yāni ca padānām/

GS41brhats_u:3362: 52.59cd/ aśubhaṃ bhaven nimittaṃ vikṛter vā agneḥ saśalyaṃ tat//
GS41brhats_u:3365: K. 53.60cd/ lohamaye śastra^bhayaṃ kapālakeśeṣu mṛtyuḥ syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3366: K. 53.61ab/ aṅgāre stenabhayaṃ bhasmani ca vinirdiśet sadāgnibhayam/
GS41brhats_u:3368: K. 53.62ab/ marmaṇyamarmago vā ruṇaddhy arthāgamaṃ tuṣasamūhaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:3370: 52.61ab/ rogād vāyuṃ pitṛto hutāśanaṃ śoṣasūtram api vitathāt/
GS41brhats_u:3371: 52.61cd/ mukhyād bhṛśaṃ jayantāc ca bhṛṅgam aditeś ca sugrīvam//
GS41brhats_u:3372: 52.62ab/ tatsampātā nava ye tāny atimarmāṇi sampradiṣṭāni/
GS41brhats_u:3373: 52.62cd/ yaś ca padasya^aṣṭāṃśas tat proktaṃ marma^parimāṇam//
GS41brhats_u:3376: 52.64ab/ sukham icchan brahmāṇaṃ yatnād rakṣed gṛhī *gṛhāntaḥstham[K.gṛtāntastham]/
GS41brhats_u:3383: 52.67cd/ teṣu ca yatha^anurūpaṃ varṇā viprādayo vāsyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3385: 52.68cd/ viśatāṃ ca yathā bhavanaṃ bhavanti tāny eva dakṣiṇataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3391: 52.71cd/ raudraṃ kṛtaghnam adhanaṃ suta^vīrya^ghnaṃ ca yāmyena//
GS41brhats_u:3393: 52.72cd/ dhanasampan nṛpati^bhayaṃ dhana^kṣayo roga ity apare//
GS41brhats_u:3395: 52.73cd/ putradhanāptir vairaṃ sutena doṣāḥ striyā naiḥsvam//
GS41brhats_u:3397: 52.74cd/ ucchrāyād dviguṇamitāṃ tyaktvā bhūmiṃ na doṣāya//
GS41brhats_u:3402: 52.77ab/ unmādaḥ svayam udghāṭite +atha pihite svayaṃ kulavināśaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3403: 52.77cd/ mānādhike nṛpa^bhayaṃ dasyubhayaṃ *vyasanam eva nīce ca[K.vyasanadaṃ nīcam]//
GS41brhats_u:3404: 52.78ab/ dvāraṃ dvārasya^upari yat tan na śivāya saṅkaṭaṃ yac ca/
GS41brhats_u:3412: 52.82ab/ purabhavanagrāmāṇāṃ ye koṇās teṣu nivasatāṃ doṣāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3417: 52.84cd/ phalinaḥ prajākṣayakarā dārūṇy api varjayed eṣām//
GS41brhats_u:3418: 52.85ab/ chindyād yadi na tarūṃś tān tadantare pūjitān vaped anyat[K.anyān]/
GS41brhats_u:3421: 52.86b snigdhā samā na suṣirā ca mahī narāṇām/
GS41brhats_u:3429: 52.89cd/ vipraḥ sarvatra vased anuvarṇam atha^iṣṭam anyeṣām//
GS41brhats_u:3430: 52.90ab/ gṛhamadhye hastamitaṃ khātvā paripūritaṃ punaḥ śvabhram/
GS41brhats_u:3431: 52.90cd/ yady ūnam aniṣṭaṃ tat same samaṃ dhanyam adhikaṃ yat//
GS41brhats_u:3432: 52.91ab/ śvabhram atha vā^ambupūrṇaṃ padaśatam itvā^āgatasya yadi na^ūnam/
GS41brhats_u:3433: 52.91cd/ tad dhanyaṃ yac ca bhavet palāny apām āḍhakaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3434: 52.92ab/ āme vā mṛtpātre śvabhrasthe dīpavartir abhyadhikam/
GS41brhats_u:3435: 52.92cd/ jvalati diśi yasya śastā sā bhūmis tasya varṇasya//
GS41brhats_u:3437: 52.93cd/ tattasya bhavati śubhadaṃ yasya ca yasmin mano ramate//
GS41brhats_u:3442: 52.96ab/ kṛṣṭāṃ prarūḍhabījāṃ go +adhyuṣitāṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ praśastāṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3445: 52.97cd/ daivatapūjāṃ kṛtvā sthapatīn abhyarcya viprāṃś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3446: 52.98ab/ vipraḥ spṛṣṭvā śīrṣaṃ vakṣaś ca kṣatriyo viśāś ca^ūrū/
GS41brhats_u:3447: 52.98cd/ śūdraḥ pādau spṛṣṭvā kuryād rekhāṃ gṛhārambhe//
GS41brhats_u:3451: 52.100cd/ taskara^bhayaṃ tṛṇena ca kāṣṭha^ullikhitā ca rājabhayam//
GS41brhats_u:3455: 52.102cd/ vācaḥ paruṣā niṣṭhīvitaṃ kṣutaṃ cāśubhaṃ kathitam//
GS41brhats_u:3456: 52.103ab/ ardhanicitaṃ kṛtaṃ vā praviśan sthapatir gṛhe nimittāni/
GS41brhats_u:3457: 52.103cd/ avalokayed gṛhapatiḥ kva saṃsthitaḥ spṛśati kiṃ cāṅgam//
GS41brhats_u:3458: 52.104ab/ ravidīpte yadi śakunis tasmin kāle virauti paruṣaravam[K.paruṣaravaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:3464: 52.107ab/ diśi śāntāyāṃ śakunir[K.śakuno] madhuravirāvī yadā tadā vācyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3466: 52.108ab/ sūtracchede mṛtyuḥ kīle ca^avāṅmukhe mahagaḥ[K.mahān rogaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:3469: 52.109cd/ bhagne +api ca karmivadhaś cyute karād gṛhapater mṛtyuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3470: 52.110ab/ dakṣiṇapūrve koṇe kṛtvā pūjāṃ śilāṃ nyaset prathamam[K.prathamām]/
GS41brhats_u:3475: 52.112cd/ śakradhvaja^*sadṛśaphalaṃ tad eva tasmin[K.sadṛśaṃ tasmiṃś ca śubhaṃ] vinirdiṣṭam//
GS41brhats_u:3477: 52.113cd/ vakre bandhuvināśo na santi garbhāś ca din^mūḍhe//
GS41brhats_u:3478: 52.114ab/ icched yadi gṛha^vṛddhiṃ tataḥ samantād vivardhayet tulyam/
GS41brhats_u:3479: 52.114cd/ eka^uddeśe doṣaḥ prāg atha vā +apy uttare kuryāt//
GS41brhats_u:3480: 52.115ab/ prāg bhavati mitravairaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ dakṣiṇena yadi vṛddhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3482: 52.116ab/ aiśānyāṃ devagṛhaṃ mahānasaṃ yadi ca^api kāryam āgneyyām/
GS41brhats_u:3484: 52.117ab/ prācyādisthe salile sutahāniḥ śikhi^bhayaṃ ripubhayaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3488: 52.119ab/ rātrau kṛtabalipūjaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ chedayed divā vṛkṣam/
GS41brhats_u:3490: 52.120ab/ chedo yady avikārī tataḥ śubhaṃ dāru tad^gṛhaupayikam/
GS41brhats_u:3491: 52.120cd/ pīte tu maṇḍale nirdiśet taror madhyagāṃ godhām//
GS41brhats_u:3492: 52.121ab/ mañjiṣṭhābhe bheko nīle sarpas tathā+aruṇe saraṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3493: 52.121cd/ mudgābhe +aśmā kapile tu mūṣako +ambhaś ca khaḍgābhe//
GS41brhats_u:3494: 52.122ab/ dhānya^go^guru^hutāśa^surāṇāṃ na svaped upari nāpy anuvaṃśam/
GS41brhats_u:3495: 52.122cd/ na^uttarāparaśirā na ca nagno naiva cārdracaraṇaḥ śriyam icchan//
GS41brhats_u:3499: 53.01ab/ dharmyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vadāmy ato +ahaṃ dakārgalaṃ[K.dagārgalaṃ] yena jala^upalabdhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3500: 53.01cd/ puṃsāṃ yathā^aṅgeṣu śirās tatha^eva kṣitāv api pronnata^nimna^saṃsthāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3501: 53.02ab/ ekena varṇena rasena ca^ambhaś cyutaṃ nabhasto vasudhā^viśeṣāt/
GS41brhats_u:3502: 53.02cd/ nānārasatvaṃ bahuvarṇatāṃ ca gataṃ parīkṣyaṃ kṣiti^tulyam eva//
GS41brhats_u:3505: 53.04ab/ dikpatisaṃjñā ca śirā navamī madhye mahāśirānāmnī/
GS41brhats_u:3507: 53.05ab/ pātālād *ūrdhvaśirā śubhā[K.ūrdhvaśirāḥ śubhāś] caturdikṣu saṃsthitā yāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3508: 53.05cd/ koṇadigutthā na śubhāḥ śirānimittāny ato vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:3509: 53.06ab/ yadi vetaso +amburahite deśe hastais tribhis tataḥ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3510: 53.06cd/ sārdhe puruṣe toyaṃ vahati śirā paścimā tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3511: 53.07ab/ cihnam api ca^ardhapuruṣe maṇḍūkaḥ pāṇḍuro +atha mṛt pītā/
GS41brhats_u:3512: 53.07cd/ puṭabhedakaś ca tasmin pāṣāṇo bhavati toyam adhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3513: 53.08ab/ jambvāś ca^udag dhastais tribhiḥ śirā^adho naradvaye pūrvā/
GS41brhats_u:3515: 53.09ab/ jambūvṛkṣasya prāg valmīko yadi bhavet samīpasthaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3517: 53.10ab/ ardhapuruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvata^sannibhaś ca pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3518: 53.10cd/ mṛd bhavati ca^atra nīlā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ ca bahu toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3519: 53.11ab/ paścād udumbarasya tribhir eva karair naradvaye sārdhe/
GS41brhats_u:3521: 53.12ab/ udag arjunasya dṛśyo valmīko yadi tato +arjunād dhastaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3522: 53.12cd/ tribhir ambu bhavati puruṣais tribhir ardha^samanvitaiḥ paścāt//
GS41brhats_u:3523: 53.13ab/ śvetā godhā^ardhanare puruṣe mṛd dhūsarā tataḥ kṛṣṇā/
GS41brhats_u:3524: 53.13cd/ pītā sitā sasikatā tato jalaṃ nirdiśed amitam//
GS41brhats_u:3526: 53.14cd/ puruṣadvaye sapāde svādu jalaṃ bhavati ca^aśoṣyam//
GS41brhats_u:3527: 53.15ab/ rohita^matsyo +ardhanare mṛt kapilā pāṇḍurā tataḥ parataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3528: 53.15cd/ sikatā saśarkarā +atha krameṇa parato bhavaty ambhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3529: 53.16ab/ pūrveṇa yadi badaryā valmīko dṛśyate jalaṃ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3531: 53.17ab/ sapalāśā badarī ced diśy aparasyāṃ tato jalaṃ bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:3532: 53.17cd/ puruṣatraye sapāde puruṣe +atra ca duṇḍubhaś[K.duṇḍubhiś] cihnam//
GS41brhats_u:3534: 53.18cd/ puruṣais tribhir ambu bhavet kṛṣṇo +ardhanare ca maṇḍūkaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3536: 53.19cd/ puruṣatraye sapāde paścimadiksthā vahati sā ca//
GS41brhats_u:3537: 53.20ab/ āpāṇḍupītikā mṛd gorasavarṇaś ca bhavati pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3539: 53.21ab/ jalaparihīne deśe vṛkṣaḥ kampillako yadā dṛśyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3540: 53.21cd/ prācyāṃ hastatritaye vahati śirā dakṣiṇā prathamam//
GS41brhats_u:3542: 53.22cd/ haste *+ajagandhako matsyakaḥ[K.+ajagandhimatsyo bhavati] payo +alpaṃ ca sakṣāram//
GS41brhats_u:3543: 53.23ab/ śoṇākataror aparottare śirā dvau karāv atikramya/
GS41brhats_u:3544: 53.23cd/ kumudā nāma śirā sā puruṣatrayavāhinī bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:3546: 53.24cd/ adhyardhe bhavati[K.tasya] śirā puruṣe jñeyā diśi prācyām//
GS41brhats_u:3547: 53.25ab/ tasya^eva paścimāyāṃ diśi valmīko yadā bhaved dhaste/
GS41brhats_u:3548: 53.25cd/ tatra^udag bhavati śirā caturbhir ardhādhikaiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3549: 53.26ab/ śveto viśvambharakaḥ prathame puruṣe tu kuṅkumābho +aśmā/
GS41brhats_u:3550: 53.26cd/ aparasyāṃ diśi ca śirā naśyati varṣatraye +atīte//
GS41brhats_u:3552: 53.27cd/ madhye tayor narair ardhapañcamais toyam akṣobhyam//
GS41brhats_u:3553: 53.28ab/ prathame puruṣe bhujagaḥ kamalodarasannibho mahī raktā/
GS41brhats_u:3555: 53.29ab/ yadi bhavati saptaparṇo valmīkavṛtas taduttare toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3556: 53.29cd/ vācyaṃ puruṣaiḥ pañcabhir atrāpi bhavanti cihnāni//
GS41brhats_u:3557: 53.30ab/ puruṣa^ardhe maṇḍūko harito haritāla^sannibhā bhūś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3559: 53.31ab/ sarveṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇām adhaḥ sthito darduro yadā dṛśyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3560: 53.31cd/ tasmād dhaste toyaṃ caturbhir ardha^adhikaiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3561: 53.32ab/ puruṣe tu bhavati nakulo nīlo mṛt pītikā tataḥ śvetā/
GS41brhats_u:3563: 53.33ab/ yady ahinilayo dṛśyo dakṣiṇataḥ saṃsthitaḥ karañjasya/
GS41brhats_u:3564: 53.33cd/ hastadvaye tu yāmye puruṣatritaye śirā sārdhe//
GS41brhats_u:3565: 53.34ab/ kacchapakaḥ puruṣa^ardhe prathamaṃ ca^udbhidyate śirā pūrvā/
GS41brhats_u:3566: 53.34cd/ udag anyā svādujalā harito +aśmādhas tatas toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3567: 53.35ab/ uttarataś ca madhūkād ahinilayaḥ paścime taros toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3570: 53.36cd/ māhendrī bhavati śirā vahati saphenaṃ sadā toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3571: 53.37ab/ valmīkaḥ snigdho dakṣiṇena tilakasya sakuśa^dūrvaś cet/
GS41brhats_u:3572: 53.37cd/ puruṣaiḥ pañcabhir ambho diśi vāruṇyāṃ śirā pūrvā//
GS41brhats_u:3573: 53.38ab/ sarpa^āvāsaḥ paścād yadā kadambasya dakṣiṇena jalam/
GS41brhats_u:3575: 53.39ab/ kauberī ca^atra śirā vahati jalaṃ lohagandhi ca^akṣobhyam/
GS41brhats_u:3577: 53.40ab/ valmīkasaṃvṛto yadi tālo vā bhavati nālikero vā/
GS41brhats_u:3578: 53.40cd/ paścāt ṣaḍbhir hastair naraiś caturbhiḥ śirā yāmyā//
GS41brhats_u:3579: 53.41ab/ yāmyena kapitthasya^ahisaṃśrayaś ced udag jalaṃ vācyam/
GS41brhats_u:3580: 53.41cd/ sapta parityajya karān khātvā puruṣān jalaṃ pañca//
GS41brhats_u:3581: 53.42ab/ karburako +ahiḥ puruṣe kṛṣṇā mṛt puṭabhid api ca pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3582: 53.42cd/ śvetā mṛt paścimataḥ śirā tataś ca^uttarā bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:3583: 53.43ab/ aśmantakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate +ahinilayo vā/
GS41brhats_u:3584: 53.43cd/ ṣaḍbhir udak tasya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣatraye toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3585: 53.44ab/ kūrmaḥ prathame puruṣe pāṣāṇo dhūsaraḥ sasikatā mṛt/
GS41brhats_u:3586: 53.44cd/ ādau *ca śirā[K.śirā ca] yāmyā pūrvottarato dvitīyā ca//
GS41brhats_u:3587: 53.45ab/ vāmena haridrataror valmīkaś *cej jalaṃ bhavati pūrve[K.cet tato jalaṃ]/
GS41brhats_u:3589: 53.46ab/ nīlo bhujagaḥ puruṣe mṛt pītā marakata^upamaś ca^aśmā/
GS41brhats_u:3590: 53.46cd/ kṛṣṇā bhūḥ prathamaṃ vāruṇī śirā dakṣiṇena^anyā//
GS41brhats_u:3592: 53.47cd/ vīraṇa^dūrvā mṛdavaś ca yatra tasmin jalaṃ puruṣe//
GS41brhats_u:3593: 53.48ab/ bhārṅgī trivṛtā dantī sūkarapādī ca lakṣmaṇā ca^eva/
GS41brhats_u:3594: 53.48cd/ navamālikā ca hastadvaye +ambu yāmye tribhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3596: 53.49cd/ suṣirā jarjara^patrā rūkṣāś ca jalena santyaktāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3599: 53.51ab/ ete yadi susnigdhā valmīkaiḥ parivṛtās tatas toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3600: 53.51cd/ hastais tribhir uttarataś caturbhir ardhena ca nareṇa[K.narasya]//
GS41brhats_u:3601: 53.52ab/ atṛṇe satṛṇā yasmin satṛṇe tṛṇavarjitā mahī yatra/
GS41brhats_u:3602: 53.52cd/ tasmin śirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyaṃ vā dhanaṃ ca^asmin//
GS41brhats_u:3603: 53.53ab/ kaṇṭaky akaṇṭakānāṃ vyatyāse +ambhas tribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3604: 53.53cd/ khātvā puruṣatritayaṃ tribhāgayuktaṃ dhanaṃ vā syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3605: 53.54ab/ nadati mahī gambhīraṃ yasmiṃś caraṇāhatā jalaṃ tasmin/
GS41brhats_u:3606: 53.54cd/ sārdhais tribhir manuṣyaiḥ kauberī tatra ca śirā syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3607: 53.55ab/ vṛkṣasya^ekā śākhā yadi vinatā bhavati pāṇḍurā vā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:3609: 53.56ab/ phala^kusuma^vikāro yasya tasya pūrve śirā tribhir hastaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3610: 53.56cd/ bhavati puruṣaiś caturbhiḥ pāṣāṇo +adhaḥ kṣitiḥ pītā//
GS41brhats_u:3611: 53.57ab/ yadi kaṇṭakārikā kaṇṭakair vinā dṛśyate sitaiḥ kusumaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3612: 53.57cd/ tasyās tale +ambu vācyaṃ tribhir narair ardhapuruṣe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3613: 53.58ab/ kharjūrī dviśiraskā yatra bhavej jalavivarjite deśe/
GS41brhats_u:3615: 53.59ab/ yadi bhavati karṇikāraḥ sitakusumaḥ syāt palāśavṛkṣo vā/
GS41brhats_u:3617: 53.60ab/ *yasyām ūṣmā[K.ūṣmā yasyām] dhātryāṃ dhūmo vā tatra vāri narayugale[K.narayugme]/
GS41brhats_u:3619: 53.61ab/ yasmin kṣetroddeśe jātaṃ sasyaṃ vināśam upayāti/
GS41brhats_u:3620: 53.61cd/ snigdham atipāṇḍuraṃ vā mahāśirā narayuge tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3621: 53.62ab/ marudeśe bhavati śirā yathā tathā^ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi/
GS41brhats_u:3622: 53.62cd/ grīvā karabhāṇām iva bhūtala^saṃsthāḥ śirā yānti//
GS41brhats_u:3623: 53.63ab/ pūrvottareṇa pīlor yadi valmīko jalaṃ bhavati paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3624: 53.63cd/ uttaragamanā ca śirā vijñeyā pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3625: 53.64ab/ cihnaṃ dardura ādau *mṛt kapilā tatparaṃ[K.mṛtkapilātaḥ paraṃ] bhaved dharitā/
GS41brhats_u:3626: 53.64cd/ bhavati ca puruṣe adho +aśmā tasya tale *+ambho vinirdeṣyam[K.vāri nirdecyam]//
GS41brhats_u:3628: 53.65cd/ diśi yāmyāyāṃ toyaṃ vaktavyaṃ saptabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3629: 53.66ab/ prathame puruṣe bhujagaḥ sitāsito hastamātramūrtiś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3630: 53.66cd/ dakṣiṇato vahati śirā sakṣāraṃ bhūri pānīyam//
GS41brhats_u:3631: 53.67ab/ uttarataś ca karīrasya^ahigṛhaṃ[K.karīrād ahinilaye] dakṣiṇe jalaṃ svādu/
GS41brhats_u:3632: 53.67cd/ daśabhiḥ puruṣair jñeyam purṣe pīto +atra maṇḍūkaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3633: 53.68ab/ rohītakasya paścād ahivāsaś cet tribhiḥ karair yāmye/
GS41brhats_u:3634: 53.68cd/ dvādaśa puruṣān khātvā sakṣārā paścimena śirā//
GS41brhats_u:3635: 53.69ab/ indrataror valmīkaḥ prāg dṛśyaḥ paścime śirā haste/
GS41brhats_u:3636: 53.69cd/ khātvā caturdaśa narān kapilā godhā nare prathame//
GS41brhats_u:3637: 53.70ab/ yadi vā suvarṇa^nāmnas taror bhaved vāmato bhujaṅga^gṛham/
GS41brhats_u:3640: 53.71cd/ raktā ca bhavati vasudhā vahati śirā dakṣiṇā tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3643: 53.73ab/ surasaṃ jalam ādau dakṣiṇā śirā vahati ca^uttaneṇa^anyā/
GS41brhats_u:3645: 53.74ab/ sakarīrā ced vadarī tribhiḥ karaiḥ paścimena tatra^ambhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3646: 53.74cd/ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ puruṣair aiśānī bahu^jalā ca śirā//
GS41brhats_u:3649: 53.76ab/ kakubha^karīrāv ekatra saṃyutau yatra kakubha^vilvau[K.bilbau] vā/
GS41brhats_u:3651: 53.77ab/ valmīka^mūrdhani yadā dūrvā ca kuśāś ca pāṇḍurāḥ santi/
GS41brhats_u:3652: 53.77cd/ kūpo madhye deyo jalam atra nara^ekaviṃśatyā//
GS41brhats_u:3654: K's tr. bhūmīkadambaka]^yutā valmīke yatra dṛśyate dūrvā/
GS41brhats_u:3657: 53.79cd/ nānā^vṛkṣaiḥ sahitas tribhir jalaṃ tatra vaktavyam//
GS41brhats_u:3658: 53.80ab/ hasta^catuṣke madhyāt ṣoḍaśabhiś ca^aṅgulair udag vāri/
GS41brhats_u:3660: 53.81ab/ granthi^pracurā yasmin śamī bhaved uttareṇa valmīkaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3662: 53.82ab/ ekasthāḥ pañca yadā valmīkā madhyamo bhavet^śvetaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3664: 53.83ab/ sa^palāśā yatra śamī paścimabhāge +ambu mānavaiḥ ṣaṣṭyā/
GS41brhats_u:3666: 53.84ab/ valmīkena parivṛtaḥ śveto rohītako bhaved yasmin/
GS41brhats_u:3668: 53.85ab/ śvetā kaṇṭaka^bahulā yatra śamī dakṣiṇena tatra payaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3670: 53.86ab/ marudeśe yac cihnaṃ na jāṅgale tair jalaṃ vinirdeśyam/
GS41brhats_u:3671: 53.86cd/ jambū^vetasa^*pūrvair[K.pūrve] ye puruṣās te marau dviguṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3672: 53.87ab/ jambūs trivṛtā maurvī[K.mūrvā] śiśumārī sārivā śivā śyāmā/
GS41brhats_u:3675: 53.88cd/ valmīkād uttaratas tribhiḥ karais tri^puruṣe toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3676: 53.89ab/ etad anūpe vācyaṃ jāṅgala^bhūmau tu pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3677: 53.89cd/ etair eva nimittair marudeśe saptabhiḥ kathayet//
GS41brhats_u:3679: 53.90cd/ tasyāṃ yatra vikāro bhavati dharitryāṃ jalaṃ tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3680: 53.91ab/ yatra snigdhā nimnā savālukā sa^anunādinī vā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:3681: 53.91cd/ tatra ardhapañcakair[K.ardhapañcamair] vāri mānavaiḥ pañcabhir yadi vā//
GS41brhats_u:3682: 53.92ab/ snigdha^tarūṇāṃ yāmye naraiś caturbhir jalaṃ prabhūtaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3683: 53.92cd/ taru^gahane +api hi vikṛto yas tasmāt tadvad eva vadet//
GS41brhats_u:3684: 53.93ab/ namate yatra dharitrī sa^ardhe puruṣe +ambu jāṅgala^anūpe/
GS41brhats_u:3685: 53.93cd/ kīṭā vā yatra vinā^ālayena bahavo +ambu tatra^api//
GS41brhats_u:3686: 53.94ab/ uṣṇā śītā ca mahī śīta^uṣṇa^ambhas tribhir naraiḥ sa^ardhaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3687: 53.94cd/ indradhanur matsyo vā valmīko vā catur^hastāt//
GS41brhats_u:3688: 53.95ab/ valmīkānāṃ paṅktyāṃ yady eko +abhyucchritaḥ śirā tad^adhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3689: 53.95cd/ śuṣyati na rohate vā sasyaṃ yasyāṃ ca tatra^ambhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3692: 53.97ab/ āgneye yadi koṇe grāmasya purasya vā bhavet[K.bhavati] kūpaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3693: 53.97cd/ nityaṃ sa karoti bhayaṃ dāhaṃ ca samānuṣaṃ prāyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3695: 53.98cd/ dik^trayam etat tyaktvā śeṣāsu śubha^āvahāḥ kūpāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3696: 53.99ab/ sārasvatena muninā dakārgalaṃ[K.dagārgalaṃ] yat krtaṃ tad avalokya/
GS41brhats_u:3697: 53.99cd/ āryābhiḥ kṛtam etad vṛttair api mānavaṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:3701: 53.100d kāśāḥ kuśā vā nalikā nalo vā//
GS41brhats_u:3711: 53.103b nīlā ca mṛd yatra saśarkarā ca/
GS41brhats_u:3713: 53.103d kṛṣṇa^atha vā yatra ca raktamṛd vā//
GS41brhats_u:3741: 53.110d tāḥ śobhanā munivaco +atra ca vṛttam etat//
GS41brhats_u:3742: 53.111a etā hy abhedyāś ca śilāḥ śivāś ca
GS41brhats_u:3745: 53.111d teṣām avṛṣṭir na bhavet kadā cit//
GS41brhats_u:3758: 53.115a naimbaṃ patraṃ tvak ca nālaṃ tilānāṃ
GS41brhats_u:3770: 53.118a pālī prāg^apara^āyatā^ambu suciraṃ dhatte na yāmyottarā
GS41brhats_u:3771: 53.118b kallolair avadāram eti marutā sā prāyaśaḥ preritaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3772: 53.118c tāṃ ced icchati sāra^dārubhir apāṃ sampātam āvārayet
GS41brhats_u:3773: 53.118d pāṣāṇa^ādibhir eva vā praticayaṃ kṣuṇṇaṃ[K.kṣunnaṃ] dvipa^aśva^ādibhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3787: 53.123cd/ śatabhiṣag ity ārambhe kūpānāṃ śasyate bhagaṇaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3789: 53.124cd/ kusumair gandhair dhūpaiḥ sampūjya nidhāpayet prathamam//
GS41brhats_u:3790: [K.54.125ab/ meghodbhavaṃ prathamam eva mayā pradiṣṭaṃ jyeṣṭhām atītya baladevamatādi dṛṣṭvā/
GS41brhats_u:3791: K.54.125cd/ bhaumaṃ dagārgalam idaṃ kathitaṃ dvitīyaṃ samyag varāhamihireṇa muniprasādāt//]
GS41brhats_u:3795: 54.02ab/ mṛdvī bhūḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ hitā tasyām tilān vapet/
GS41brhats_u:3796: 54.02cd/ puṣpitāṃs tāṃś ca mṛdnīyāt[K.gṛhṇīyāt] karma^etat prathamaṃ bhuvaḥ[K.bhuvi]//
GS41brhats_u:3798: 54.03cd/ maṅgalyāḥ pūrvam ārāme ropaṇīyā gṛheṣu vā//
GS41brhats_u:3807: 54.08ab/ śucir bhūtvā taroḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā snāna^anulepanaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3808: 54.08cd/ ropayed ropitaś ca^eva patrais tair eva jāyate//
GS41brhats_u:3809: 54.09ab/ sāyaṃ prātaś ca gharma^ṛtau[K.gharmānte] śītakāle dina^antare/
GS41brhats_u:3810: 54.09cd/ varṣāsu ca bhuvaḥ śoṣe sektavyā ropitā drumāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3813: 54.11ab/ vañjulo naktamālaś ca tilakaḥ panasas tathā/
GS41brhats_u:3818: 54.13cd/ miśrair mūlaiś ca na phalaṃ samyag yacchanti pīḍitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3823: 54.16ab/ phala^nāśe kulatthaiś ca māṣair mudgais tilair yavaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3836: 54.21cd/ pūtimāṃsa^sahitaiś ca secitā dhūpitā ca satataṃ haridrayā//
GS41brhats_u:3858: 54.27cd/ etat tailena vā bījaṃ ślaiṣmātaka[K.ū.śleṣmātaka]^phalena vā//
GS41brhats_u:3863: 54.30ab/ māhiṣa^gomaya^ghṛṣṭāny asya karīṣe ca tāni nikṣipya/
GS41brhats_u:3868: 55.01ab/ kṛtvā prabhūtaṃ salilam ārāmān viniveśya ca/
GS41brhats_u:3870: 55.02ab/ iṣṭā^pūrtena labhyante ye lokās tān bubhūṣatā/
GS41brhats_u:3871: 55.02cd/ devānām ālayaḥ kāryo dvayam api atra dṛśyate//
GS41brhats_u:3886: 55.09cd/ tā eva teṣāṃ śasyante devatā^āyataneṣv api//
GS41brhats_u:3888: 55.10cd/ dvāraṃ ca madhyamaṃ tasmin[K.tatra] samadiksthaṃ praśasyate//
GS41brhats_u:3889: 55.11ab/ yo vistāro bhaved yasya dviguṇā tatsamunnatiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3890: 55.11cd/ ucchrāyād yas tṛtīyāṃśas tena tulyā *kaṭiḥ smṛtā[K.kaṭir bhavet]//
GS41brhats_u:3900: 55.16cd/ dvau bhāgau pratimā tatra tṛtīyāṃśaś ca piṇḍikā//
GS41brhats_u:3905: 55.19ab/ ity ete viṃśatiḥ proktāḥ prāsādāḥ saṃjñayā mayā/
GS41brhats_u:3907: 55.20ab/ tatra ṣaḍaśrir merur dvādaśa^bhaumo vicitra^kuharaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3913: 55.23ab/ vṛttaḥ samudga^nāmā padmaḥ padma^ākṛtiḥ śayā aṣṭau[K.śayānāṣṭau]/
GS41brhats_u:3914: 55.23cd/ śṛṅgeṇa^ekena bhaved eka^eva ca bhūmikā tasya//
GS41brhats_u:3915: 55.24ab/ garuḍa^ākṛtiś ca garuḍo nandī^iti ca ṣaṭcatuṣka^vistīrṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3916: 55.24cd/ kāryas tu[K.ca] sapta^bhaumo vibhūṣito +aṇḍais tu[K.ca] viṃśatyā//
GS41brhats_u:3917: 55.25ab/ kuñjara iti gaja^pṛṣṭhaḥ ṣoḍaśahastaḥ samantato mūlāt/
GS41brhats_u:3921: 55.27ab/ dvārair yutaś caturbhir bahu^śikharo bhavati sarvatobhadraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3927: 55.30ab/ prāhuḥ sthapatayaś ca^atra matam ekaṃ vipaścitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3930: 55.31b gargeṇa yad viracitaṃ tad iha^asti sarvam/
GS41brhats_u:3934: 56.01ab/ āmaṃ tindukam āmaṃ kapitthakaṃ puṣpam api ca śālmalyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3937: 56.02cd/ avatāryo +asya ca kalko dravyair etaiḥ samanuyojyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3945: 56.06cd/ vajrākhyaḥ prathamaguṇair ayam api teṣv eva kāryeṣu//
GS41brhats_u:3948: 56.08ab/ aṣṭau sīsaka^bhāgāḥ kāṃsasya dvau tu rītikā^bhāgaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3951: 57.01ab/ jāla^antarage bhānau yad aṇutaraṃ darśanaṃ rajo yāti/
GS41brhats_u:3952: 57.01cd/ tad vindyāt paramāṇuṃ prathamaṃ taddhi pramāṇānām//
GS41brhats_u:3954: 57.02cd/ aṣṭaguṇāni yathottaram aṅgulam ekaṃ bhavati saṃkhyā[K.mātrā]//
GS41brhats_u:3957: 57.04ab/ svair aṅgula^pramāṇair dvādaśa vīstīrṇam[U.vistīrṇam] āyataṃ ca mukham/
GS41brhats_u:3958: 57.04cd/ nagnajitā tu caturdaśa dairghyeṇa drāviḍaṃ kathitam//
GS41brhats_u:3960: 57.05cd/ dve aṅgule ca hanunī[K.hanuke] cibukaṃ ca dvyaṅgulaṃ vitatam[K.vistṛtam]//
GS41brhats_u:3961: 57.06ab/ aṣṭa^aṅgulaṃ lalāṭaṃ vistārād dvy^aṅgulāt pare śaṅkhau/
GS41brhats_u:3962: 57.06cd/ catur^aṅgulau tu śaṅkhau karṇau tu dvy^aṅgulau[K.dvyaṅgulaṃ] pṛthulau//
GS41brhats_u:3967: 57.09ab/ ardha^aṅgulā tu gocchā vaktraṃ catur^aṅgula^āyataṃ kāryam/
GS41brhats_u:3968: 57.09cd/ vipulaṃ tu sa^ardham aṅgulam *avyāttaṃ try^aṅgulaṃ[K.adhyāttattryaṅgulaṃ] vyāttam//
GS41brhats_u:3969: 57.10ab/ dvy^aṅgula^tulyau nāsāpuṭau ca nāsā puṭā^agrato jñeyā/
GS41brhats_u:3970: 57.10cd/ syād dvy^aṅgulam ucchrāyaś catur^aṅgulam antaraṃ ca^akṣṇoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3973: 57.12ab/ paryantāt paryantaṃ daśa bhruvo +ardha^aṅgulaṃ bhruvor lekhā/
GS41brhats_u:3978: 57.14cd/ dvādaśa tu citra^karmaṇi dṛśyante viṃśatir adṛśyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3980: 57.15cd/ grīvā daśa vistīrṇā pariṇāhād viṃśatiḥ sa^ekā//
GS41brhats_u:3981: 57.16ab/ kaṇṭhād dvādaśa hṛdayaṃ hṛdayān nābhī[K.nābhiś] ca tat^pramāṇena/
GS41brhats_u:3983: 57.17ab/ ūrū ca^aṅgula^mānaiś catur^yutā viṃśatis tathā jaṅghe/
GS41brhats_u:3984: 57.17cd/ jānukapicche catur^aṅgule ca pādau ca tat^tulyau//
GS41brhats_u:3985: 57.18ab/ dvādaśa^dīrghau ṣaṭ pṛthutayā ca pādau trika^āyata^aṅguṣṭhau/
GS41brhats_u:3991: 57.21ab/ jaṅgha^agre pariṇāhaś caturdaśa^uktas tu vistarāt[K.vistaraḥ] pañca/
GS41brhats_u:3992: 57.21cd/ madhye tu sapta vipulā pariṇāhāt triguṇitāḥ sapta//
GS41brhats_u:3993: 57.22ab/ aṣṭau tu jānumadhye vaipulyaṃ try^aṣṭakaṃ tu pariṇāhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3994: 57.22cd/ vipulau caturdaśa^ūrū madhye dviguṇaś ca tat^paridhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3995: 57.23ab/ kaṭir aṣṭādaśa vipulā catvāriṃśac catur^yutā paridhau/
GS41brhats_u:3996: 57.23cd/ aṅgulam ekaṃ nābhī[K.nābhir] vedhena tathā pramāṇena//
GS41brhats_u:3998: 57.24cd/ stanayoḥ ṣoḍaśa ca^antaram ūrdhvaṃ kakṣye[K.kakṣe] ṣaḍ^aṅgulike//
GS41brhats_u:3999: 57.25ab/ *aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū kāryau[K.kāryāv aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū] tathā prabāhū ca/
GS41brhats_u:4001: 57.26ab/ ṣoḍaśa bāhū mūle pariṇāhād dvādaśa^agra^haste ca/
GS41brhats_u:4004: 57.27cd/ anayā tulyā ca^anāmikā kaniṣṭhā tu parva^ūnā//
GS41brhats_u:4005: 57.28ab/ parva^dvayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ śeṣa^aṅgulyas[K.śeṣāṅgulayas] tribhis tribhiḥ kāryāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4009: 57.30ab/ daśaratha^tanayo rāmo baliś ca vairocaniḥ śataṃ viṃśam/
GS41brhats_u:4011: 57.31ab/ kāryo +aṣṭabhujo bhagavāṃś catur^bhujo dvibhuja eva vā viṣṇuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4017: 57.34ab/ atha ca caturbhujam icchati śāntida eko gadā^dharaś ca^anyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4018: 57.34cd/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve tv[K.hy] evaṃ vāme śaṅkhaś ca cakraṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:4019: 57.35ab/ dvibhujasya tu śānti^karo dakṣiṇa^hasto +aparaś ca śaṅkha^dharaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4020: 57.35cd/ evaṃ viṣṇoḥ pratimā kartavyā bhūtim icchadbhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4025: 57.38ab/ kāryā caturbhujā yā vāma^karābhyāṃ sa^pustakaṃ kamalam/
GS41brhats_u:4026: 57.38cd/ dvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇa^pārśve varam arthiṣv akṣa^sūtraṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:4027: 57.39ab/ *vāmo +atha vā^aṣṭa^bhujāyāḥ[K.vāmeṣv aṣṭabhujāyāḥ] kamaṇḍaluś cāpam ambujaṃ śāstram/
GS41brhats_u:4029: 57.40ab/ śāmbaś ca gadā^hastaḥ pradyumnaś cāpa^bhṛt surūpaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4034: 57.42cd/ tiryag lalāṭa^saṃsthaṃ tṛtīyam api locanaṃ cihnam//
GS41brhats_u:4035: 57.43ab/ śambhoḥ śirasi^indukalā vṛṣa^dhvajo +akṣi ca tṛtīyam api ca^ūrdhvam/
GS41brhats_u:4036: 57.43cd/ śūlaṃ dhanuḥ pinākaṃ vāma^ardhe vā girisutā^ardham//
GS41brhats_u:4040: 57.45cd/ dig^vāsās taruṇo rūpavāṃś ca kāryo +arhatāṃ devaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4042: 57.46cd/ kuryād udīcya^veṣaṃ gūḍhaṃ pādād uro yāvat//
GS41brhats_u:4047: 57.49ab/ saumyā tu hasta^mātrā vasudā hasta^dvaya^ucchritā pratimā/
GS41brhats_u:4051: 57.51ab/ maraṇaṃ tu sa^kṣatāyāṃ śastra^nipātena nirdiśet kartuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4053: 57.52ab/ andhatvam ūrdhva^dṛṣṭyā karoti cintām adhomukhī dṛṣṭiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4055: 57.53ab/ liṅgasya vṛtta^paradhiṃ dairghyeṇa^āsūtrya tat tridhā vibhajet/
GS41brhats_u:4056: 57.53cd/ mūle tac caturasraṃ[K.caturaśraṃ] madhye tv aṣṭāśriṃ vṛttam ataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4057: 57.54ab/ caturasram[K.caturaśram] avani^khāte madhyaṃ kāryaṃ tu piṇḍikā^śvabhre/
GS41brhats_u:4060: 57.55cd/ yasya kṣataṃ bhaved mastake vināśāya tal^liṅgam//
GS41brhats_u:4063: 57.57ab/ daṇḍī yamo mahiṣago haṃsa^ārūḍhaś ca pāśabhṛd varuṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4080: 58.07ab/ liṅgaṃ vā pratimā vā drumavat sthāpyā yathā diśaṃ yasmāt/
GS41brhats_u:4081: 58.07cd/ tasmāc cihnayitavyā diśo drumasya^ūrdhvam atha vā^adhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4083: 58.08cd/ madyaiḥ kusumair dhūpair gandhaiś ca taruṃ samabhyarcya//
GS41brhats_u:4085: 58.09cd/ kṛtvā rātrau pūjāṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃspṛśya ca brūyāt//
GS41brhats_u:4087: 58.10cd/ namas te vṛkṣa pūjeyaṃ vidhivat sampragṛhyatām//
